javascript.description: Use camelCase for variable and function names
javascript.suggestion: Use camelCase for naming variables and functions (e.g., myVariable instead of my_variable)
Use 2 spaces for indentation instead of tabs or inconsistent spacing
Add semicolons at the end of statements

python.description: Use snake_case for variable and function names
python.suggestion: Use snake_case for naming variables and functions (e.g., my_variable instead of myVariable)

java.description: Class names should be in PascalCase

java.description: Method names should be in camelCase
java.suggestion: Method names should start with a lowercase letter

csharp.suggestion: Use PascalCase for class names and public members
